statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp, transaction_type FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_timestamp, wallet_address FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT wallet_address, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY wallet_address HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT wallet_address, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY wallet_address ORDER BY avg_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT wallet_address, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM wallet_interactions GROUP BY wallet_address;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY sender_address ASC
SELECT interaction_id, wallet_address, interaction_timestamp FROM wallet_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT receiver_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY receiver_address HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM wallet_interactions WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%ABC%' OR interaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY interaction_id ASC
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address != receiver_address AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, sender_address ASC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT block_number, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_interactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, wallet_id, interaction_type, amount FROM wallet_interactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions JOIN wallet_interactions ON blockchain_transactions.transaction_id = wallet_interactions.transaction_id WHERE blockchain_transactions.block_number % 2 = 0;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_type LIKE '%summary%' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description, interaction_timestamp FROM wallet_interactions WHERE wallet_address = '0xABCDEF';
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description, interaction_timestamp FROM wallet_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT wt.wallet_address, wm.metadata_key, wm.metadata_value FROM wallet_metadata wm JOIN wallet_interactions wt ON wm.wallet_address = wt.wallet_address ORDER BY wm.metadata_key ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT bt.transaction_hash, ti.interaction_description, bt.amount FROM blockchain_transactions bt JOIN wallet_interactions ti ON bt.sender_address = ti.wallet_address WHERE bt.amount < 100 ORDER BY bt.transaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT payer_wallet_address, payee_wallet_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 1000;
SELECT interaction_id, wallet_address, interaction_type FROM wallet_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT payer_wallet_address, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY payer_wallet_address ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND interaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
